name: chicagotribune
text: Illinois State athletes were disappointed and shocked that while mentioning racial injustices at the end of their video call Wednesday, athletic director Larry Lyons told them “All Redbird Lives Matter.” https://t.co/aC0YlFzNvi

name: chicagotribune
text: A Black journalist resigned Saturday from his job at the Kenosha News in Wisconsin after objecting to the headline of an article that chronicled a rally in support of Jacob Blake, reports The New York Times https://t.co/8DyAIecwXN
